sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './mainWeather.css' function MainWeather (props){ const { wea_Date ,toLeft, toRight }= props return

  • {wea_Date.city}

    {wea_Date.date}，{wea_Date.week}

    {wea_Date.tem}℃

    {wea_Date.tem1}℃/{wea_Date.tem2}℃ {wea_Date.wea}

    {toLeft();this.forceUpdate()}} >
    {toRight();this.forceUpdate()}}>
} export default MainWeather
